```{r}
library(Matrix)
library(expm)
s=matrix(c(8,2,3,1,
           2,5,-1,3,
           3,-1,6,-2,
           1,3,-2,7),nrow = 4)
p=nrow(s)
q=2
n=col(s)
s11=s[1:q,1:q]
s12=s[1:q,(q+1):p]
s22=s[(q+1):p,(q+1):p]
s21=t(s12)

A=solve(sqrtm(s22))%*%s21%*%solve(sqrtm(s11))
R1=t(A)%*%A
R2=A%*%t(A)

E=eigen(R1)$vectors
L1=eigen(R1)$values
F=eigen(R2)$vectors
L2=eigen(R2)$values

U=solve(sqrtm(s11))%*%E
V=solve(sqrtm(s22))%*%F

ro=sqrt(L1)

sprintf("rho(1)=first cononical correlation coff=%f",ro[1])
sprintf("rho(2)=second cononical correlation coff=%f",ro[2])
sprintf("coeff of first pair of cononical variables are (in column)")
print(cbind(U[,2],V[,2]))


sprintf("The vcm of conanical variable is :") 
ccmat=t(U)%*%s12%*%V
print(ccmat)

      
```
